<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Adaptive Ablation](/Spells.aspx?ID=595)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You shift yourself to adapt to the mystical wavelengths of the energy damage, protecting yourself from further harm. You gain resistance 5 to the triggering energy type; you gain this resistance after you take the triggering damage, so it applies only to future damage you take during the duration.

---
**Heightened (+2)** Increase the resistance by 5.
name: Adaptive Ablation
